entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:27 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 2:07 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.3°C
Wind: NE 14 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
